data.comment: The match is underway in Tilburg.
Ajax take a 0-1 lead thanks to Antony Santos.
In the minute 4, That's a fine assist from Klaas-Jan Huntelaar.
Adrie Koster (Willem II) is making a first substitution, with Gorkem Saglam replacing Sebastian Holmen.
Jeroen Manschot blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Willem II Stadion.
Goal! Kwasi Okyere Wriedt levels the match at 1-1.
Davy Klaassen, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Jurgen Ekkelenkamp is the substitute for Ajax.
In the minute 65, Antony Santos (Ajax) has received a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Zakaria Labyad with Quincy Promes. This is the second substitution made today by Erik ten Hag.
Mats Kohlert is replacing Che Nunnely for Willem II at Willem II Stadion.
In the minute 82, Erik ten Hag is making the team's third substitution at Willem II Stadion with Devyne Rensch replacing Sean Klaiber.
It seems as if Wesley Spieringhs is unable to continue. Ole Romeny replaces him for the home team.
John Yeboah is replacing Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye for the home team.
Jeroen Manschot blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
